message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice,  $11,500 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $10,500.  This reflects the value I place on the product and allows for a fair profit for you.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This still leaves some room for profit for you, and I'm confident we can close this deal.
